descriptionHtml:
Hi there,

I searched for faster casting spell mods and i found a russian version. But this mod altered the Language to. 

So I decided to do it.

I have altered  four things:

1 . zero cast duration time for any destruction spells
2 - the three master spells from the destruction school can ignore resistance
3 - zero cast duration time for every heal from the restoration school
4 - the spell soul capture has an extended duration: 360 seconds

That´s it. Nothing more just the standard vanilla spells where changed.

Installation
drop it in your Skyrim main folder or use NexusModManager

If you want to have other cast duration times just ask me. Maybe I like to do it.
One last thing every spell is from the english version of Skyrim, no Dlc´s where used and I tested all the spells one hour.

Update to 1.01:

Thunderbolt and Blizzard now instant and soul capture is aimed on 150 ft.

Update to 1.02:

I realized that soul trap is way to expensive. With my changes it likes to cost around 750 mana.
I reduced this value to a normal amount
author: Ryuoga

files.name: fast cast
